pages.text: We're quite pleased with you progress and we think it's time you stand on your own for once.$(br2)You have been proven to be a quite resourceful specimen and we have trust that you will manage this task.$(br2)If you happen to fail though you would be stuck here for an indefinite amount of time, so yeah don't fail us.

pages.title: Good luck you dummy
pages.text: To enter the next $(item)Simulation$() you need to find a way to gather $(item)Ardite Ore$() and $(item)Cobalt Ore$() from the $(item)Void$(), you should also look into ways of gathering a lot of $(item)Cobblestone$().

pages.title: Portal Activator
pages.text: Lighting the $(item)Portal$() to the third $(item)Simulation$() requires you to hold the feather of a $(item)Blood Raven$().
